divs: Sighting Details Around 9:45 pm and 10:00 pm we noticed a light comming from the west over the hills of Shadysde, Ohio. It traveled extremely fast compared to the jets that fly over us a high altitudes. I venture to say it was under 10,000 feet twice as big as the North Star. And it proceeded to go in a straight line to the east kept same speed through out our observation. Their was no sound attached to the object it had no flashing lights whatsoever. But, kept in a easternly direction till over the hills beside our town. Noticed from the back sde of the object light became dim. We are located 12 miles South of Wheeling, WV on Rt # 2 and next to Glendale,WV. Across from us to the East is Shadyside, Powhaten and Bellaire, Ohio. Wanted to let you know what we saw. I was hot in the Apt so we sat outside that's when we saw it. We weren't shook because my wife ai talk of this regularly I'm a student of Mr. William Lyne who studies saucers. According to Rense program it's been seen in PA.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Moundsville
There were no other sightings in Moundsville on or around July 18th 2008
